name: Merit-based Scholarship
eligibility: Students with 85% and above in Class 12
details: Awarded to students based on academic performance.

name: Need-based Scholarship
details: Financial assistance for students in need.

name: Sports Scholarship
details: For students who have represented at state or national level.

name: Cultural Scholarship
eligibility: Students with exceptional talent in arts and culture

name: STEM Scholarship
eligibility: Students enrolling in Science, Technology, Engineering, and Mathematics courses
details: Encourages students to pursue STEM fields.

name: J&K Post-Matric Scholarship (State)
eligibility: Students from Jammu & Kashmir enrolled in UG programs; annual family income below ₹200000
details: State scheme supporting undergraduate studies for residents of Jammu & Kashmir.

name: Women in STEM Excellence Grant
eligibility: Female students admitted to B.Tech, B.Sc, or related STEM programs
details: Supports girls and women pursuing STEM degrees with mentorship and stipend.

name: Minority Students Support Scholarship
eligibility: Students from notified minority communities with income below ₹250000
details: Tuition assistance for meritorious minority students pursuing UG degrees.

name: Sports Talent Scholarship (State Level)
eligibility: Students who represented at state or national level sports; attendance 75%+
details: Encourages excellence in sports alongside academics.

name: Arts & Culture Fellowship
eligibility: Students with achievements in fine arts, music, theatre, or crafts
details: Supports training and materials for cultural pursuits.

name: Rural Students Merit Scholarship
eligibility: Students from rural districts of J&K with 80%+ in Class 12
details: Aims to bridge educational access gaps for rural youth in Jammu & Kashmir.

name: Tech Innovators Scholarship
eligibility: Students pursuing B.Tech in Computer Science, IT, or ECE
details: Awarded for demonstrated interest in innovation, coding, or hardware projects.
